title: Super Bowl Weekend Is Here.
itunes:title: Super Bowl Weekend Is Here.
description:
Colin says we all need to slow down on Patrick Mahomes because he's actually struggled to win in prime time and has never played a playoff game outside of Kansas City. He makes his official pick for the Super Bowl. Patriots CB Stephon Gilmore tells Colin what he thinks Tom Brady will do this off-season. Plus, Hall of Famer Michael Strahan talks about his Super Bowl experiences and how even he was surprised at how they handled the undefeated Patriots.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
